description: 'Hard-Pressed'  Scott O'Hara - the man whose overwhelming endowment has been judged the 'Biggest Cock in San Franncisco' - and his leatherman buddy Nik Dimon happen one day on what every sex-master dreams of:  a naked smooth blond sex-slave handcuffed spreadeagled to a chain-link fence!  Shawn McIvan has just been sexually assaulted by a youth gang and left helplessly strung up, struggling to free himself from his embarassing bondage.  Scott and Nik come to the blond's rescue, all right, but not without taking a few liberties of their own, first, and then demanding their reward in a session of heavy-duty asspacking that results in Mr. Biggest Cock delivering a load which must be seen to be believed.
title: Ramcharger, Scene #06
